channel.title: How to add battery charge level to panel?
channel.description: I would like for my laptop's battery charge level to display in the panel. How can I get this done?

item.title: How to add battery charge level to panel?
item.dc:creator: linuxer
item.description:
install plugins for different processes
sudo apt update && sudo apt install xfce4-battery-plugin xfce4-cpugraph-plugin xfce4-fsguard-plugin xfce4-netload-plugin xfce4-systemload-plugin

Read full topic
item.source: How to add battery charge level to panel?
